thought.text:
So the fix was included in v2.14.1! This means that either:

1. There's a regression that happened after v2.14.1
2. There's a specific edge case that wasn't covered by the original fix
3. The user's configuration or setup has some specific issue

Let me check if there were any changes to the `_discover_files` method after the fix:

action.command: cd /tmp/tmpr59rsqbu/pylint && git log --oneline v2.14.1..HEAD -- pylint/lint/pylinter.py | grep -i "discover\|ignore\|recursive"
